oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hawaiian Wedding Song - Marty Robbins performance; Drowsy Waters (Wailana) - Marty Robbins performance
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance of Hawaiian Wedding Song, written by Al Hoffman, Charles E. King, and Dick Manning, published by Hoffman Al Song Inc. and Universal Music Corporation, produced by Don Law and Frank Jones, recorded on April 11, 1963 at Columbia Recording Studio in Nashville, TN, released by Columbia in 1963, and performed by Marty Robbins (vocals), Grady Martin (guitar), Jack Pruett (guitar), Jerry Byrd (steel), Bob Moore (bass), Louis Dunn (drums), and Bill Pursell (piano). Performance of Drowsy Waters (Wailana), written by Jack Ailau, published by EMI Miller Catalog Inc., produced by Don Law and Frank Jones, arranged by Jerry Byrd, recorded on April 11, 1963 at Columbia Recording Studio in Nashville, TN, released by Columbia in 1963, and performed by Marty Robbins (vocals), Grady Martin (guitar), Jack Pruett (guitar), Jerry Byrd (steel), Bob Moore (bass), Louis Dunn (drums), and Bill Pursell (piano).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Marty Robbins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Marty Robbins performs "Hawaiian Wedding Song" / (2:25) Marty Robbins performs "Drowsy Waters (Wailana)"
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Law, Donald F., 1902-1982; Jones, Frank, 1928-2005; Columbia Records, Inc; Robbins, Marty; Martin, Grady, 1929-; Moore, Bob, 1932-; Pruett, Jack; Byrd, Jerry (Guitarist); Dunn, Louie; Pursell, Bill;
